ValidationRule.description: This will ensure that an individual day is not less than the zero hrs
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR(pse__Monday_Hours__c < 0, pse__Tuesday_Hours__c < 0, pse__Wednesday_Hours__c < 0, pse__Thursday_Hours__c < 0, pse__Friday_Hours__c < 0, pse__Saturday_Hours__c < 0, pse__Sunday_Hours__c < 0)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: No individual day for a single line can be less than zero hours
